attributes.action: Need Change the salary threshold for sponsorship
attributes.additional_details: Government was change the salary threshold for sponsorship from 26200£ to 38700£ which is very high deference. Government need to resolve it and make a good salary threshold which will be good for sponsorship holders and for sponsor as well.
attributes.background: Government raise the salary threshold for sponsorship it is too high government need to look out this and need to change it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Reduce salary threshold of 38,700 for visa sponsorship requirements
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/702099
